Description: Sunny spacious 4 bedroom unit located on the Brighton/ Brookline line, in Cleveland circle. Walk to 3 t's, restaurants, running trails, parks. .. Condo features hardwood floors, high ceilings with fans. Big living room and dining room. Comes with fire place and free laundry in building. Parking off street for rent. Freshly painted home with new stove. Quick 5 min walk to public transit and a great neighborhood.
